long_description: Made in Italy, the Von Zipper Lesmore Sunglasses dish up retro styling and serious eye protection for all the time you spend in the sun. Lesmore lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses and Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames are highly impact-resistant. Frames remain flexible at any temperature. The Von Zipper Lesmore Sunglasses feature stainless-steel optical hinges for durability.
short_description: Made in Italy, the Von Zipper Lesmore Sunglasses dish up retro styling and serious eye protection for all the time you spend in the sun.
